titleStmt.title: By the protector, a declaration of His Highness the Lord Protector for a day of solemn fasting and humiliation
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills and John Field ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at White Hall the nine and twentieth day of April in the year of our Lord, 1658."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
